replies.msg:
Hi guys I am starting a new series called word of the day. It's not the typical English you will use but it's gonna be really handy when they come into use, hopefully you guys will sound way cooler than you used to be.

BOTTLEJOB
Definition: Someone who backs down from a challenge at the last moment without legitimate excuses
E.g. Mustafi is a fucking bottlejob!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z0i4uUETKMY
